# This file was generated by FRUT's Jucer2CMake from "jucy-bus.jucer"

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.4)

project("jucy-bus")


list(APPEND CMAKE_MODULE_PATH "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../FRUT/prefix/FRUT/cmake")
include(Reprojucer)


set(jucy_bus_jucer_FILE
  "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/jucy-bus.jucer"
)


set(JUCE_MODULES_GLOBAL_PATH "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../JUCE/modules")


jucer_project_begin(
  JUCER_FORMAT_VERSION "1"
  PROJECT_FILE "${jucy_bus_jucer_FILE}"
  PROJECT_ID "EvBDFc"
)

jucer_project_settings(
  PROJECT_NAME "jucy-bus"
  PROJECT_VERSION "1.0.0"
  USE_GLOBAL_APPCONFIG_HEADER OFF
  ADD_USING_NAMESPACE_JUCE_TO_JUCE_HEADER OFF
  DISPLAY_THE_JUCE_SPLASH_SCREEN ON # Required for closed source applications without an Indie or Pro JUCE license
  PROJECT_TYPE "Dynamic Library"
  BUNDLE_IDENTIFIER "com.yourcompany.jucybus"
  CXX_LANGUAGE_STANDARD "C++17"
)

jucer_project_files("jucy-bus/Source"
# Compile   Xcode     Binary    File
#           Resource  Resource
  x         .         .         "Source/jucy-bus.cpp"
  .         .         .         "Source/jucy-bus.h"
)
